text.name: Sacrifice for the Family
text.desc:
[WhenUse] Gain +3 [Aggro] to this Skill Slot next turn
[WhenUse] Gain 10 [Laceration]
- At 50%+ HP, gain +15 additional [Laceration]

text.name: Sacrifice for the Family
text.desc:
[WhenUse] Gain +3 [Aggro] to this Skill Slot next turn
<style="highlight">[WhenUse] If target has 6+ [Laceration], Coin Power +1
[WhenUse] Gain 10 [Laceration]
- At 50%+ HP, gain 15 additional [Laceration]

text.name: Sacrifice for the Family
text.desc:
[WhenUse] Gain +3 [Aggro] to this Skill Slot next turn
<style="highlight">[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 6 [Laceration] on target (max 2)
[WhenUse] Gain 10 [Laceration]
- At 50%+ HP, gain 15 additional [Laceration]

text.name: Suffocating Guilt
text.desc:
[WhenUse] Gain +3 [Aggro] to this Skill Slot next turn
[WhenUse] Gain 10 [Laceration]
[WhenUse] At 5+ [WornHeartGreg], consume up to 60 [BloodDinner]; then, gain 1 [BloodyHandGregFirst] for every 6 [BloodDinner] consumed
- At less than 5 [WornHeartGreg], gain 10 [Laceration] and 2 [BloodyHandGregFirst]

text.name: Suffocating Guilt
text.desc:
[WhenUse] Gain +3 [Aggro] to this Skill Slot next turn
<style="highlight">[WhenUse] If target has 6+ [Laceration], Coin Power +1
[WhenUse] Gain 10 [Laceration]
[WhenUse] At 5+ [WornHeartGreg], consume up to 60 [BloodDinner]; then, gain 1 [BloodyHandGregFirst] for every 6 [BloodDinner] consumed
- At less than 5 [WornHeartGreg], gain 10 [Laceration] and 2 [BloodyHandGregFirst]

text.name: Suffocating Guilt
text.desc:
[WhenUse] Gain +3 [Aggro] to this Skill Slot next turn
<style="highlight">[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 6 [Laceration] on target (max 2)
[WhenUse] Gain 10 [Laceration]
[WhenUse] At 5+ [WornHeartGreg], consume up to 60 [BloodDinner]; then, gain 1 [BloodyHandGregFirst] for every 6 [BloodDinner] consumed
- At less than 5 [WornHeartGreg], gain 10 [Laceration] and <style="highlight">3 [BloodyHandGregFirst]

text.name: The Unforgivable Sin
text.desc:
On Hit with this Skill: heal 50% of the HP damage dealt (max 100 per Skill)
[WhenUse] Deal +1% damage for every 1% missing HP on self (max 60%)
[WhenUse] If target has 6+ [Laceration], Coin Power +1
[WhenUse] Consume every excess Stack of [BloodyHandGregFirst] past 10 Stack to gain the following effects:
- Heal (Stacks consumed x 3) HP on self
- If this unit consumed 10+ Stack, Coin Power +1
[WhenUse] Gain 10 [Laceration]
[EndSkill] Heal 10% HP on self

text.name: The Unforgivable Sin
text.desc:
On Hit with this Skill: heal 50% of the HP damage dealt (max 100 per Skill)
[WhenUse] Deal <style="highlight">+1.5% damage for every 1% missing HP on self <style="highlight">(max 90%)
[WhenUse] If target has 6+ [Laceration], Coin Power +1
[WhenUse] Consume every excess Stack of [BloodyHandGregFirst] past 10 Stack to gain the following effects:
- Heal (Stacks consumed x 3) HP on self
- If this unit consumed 10+ Stack, Coin Power +1
<style="highlight">- If this unit consumed 20 Stack, Reuse the final Coin
[WhenUse] Gain 10 [Laceration]
[EndSkill] Heal 10% HP on self

1121031.name: Don Quixote Hardblood Arts 6: Whip
1121031.desc:
1 ally with the lowest HP percentage heals 3 HP On Hit (3 times per turn)
- If the target hit by the said ally had [Laceration], heal 3 additional HP

1121001.name: Self-destructive Dedication
1121001.desc:
Turn End: heal ((10 - [WornHeartGreg])/2) SP for the ally with the least SP (excluding: self or allies that are Panicked or Corroded; rounded down)
In this Encounter, when this unit takes damage that brings their HP down to 0, nullify that damage; then, this unit's HP cannot drop below 1 for the turn. (once per Encounter)

1121002.name: Bloodfeast
1121002.desc:
If this unit is on field, or is one of the units that can appear on this Stage, increase [BloodDinner] value by the amount of [Laceration] damage collectively received by every unit. 
When this unit enters the field, the sleeping blood drenching the battlefield will rise above the surface.

1121011.name: Self-destructive Dedication
1121011.desc:
Turn End: heal (10 - [WornHeartGreg]) SP for the ally with the least SP (excluding: self or allies that are Panicked or Corroded)
In this Encounter, when this unit takes damage that brings their HP down to 0, nullify that damage; then, this unit's HP cannot drop below 1 for the turn. (once per Encounter)

1121021.name: Don Quixote Hardblood Arts 6: Whip
1121021.desc: 1 ally with the lowest HP percentage heals 3 HP On Hit (3 times per turn)
